text: Is anyone getting “too many redirect” errors on preview pages?

I'm having a problem using the global theme options for Google fonts. I have `load_external_fonts` set to true, and some of the font options are using bold font weights (headers), but HubSpot still only seems to import the regular font weight version of the font. Anyone know if I'm doing something wrong or missing something?
Seems to have fixed itself if anyone is wondering
Hi there, I'm having some trouble tracking YouTube video clicks (to play the video) with Google Tag Manager in HubSpot. Just looking to see how you guys are handling this.
